subject: Public Relations and Publicity
Deaths (Obituaries)
New York City Marathon
Madison Square Garden
lead_paragraph: Mr. Goldstein was a publicist who promoted Madison Square Garden basketball, the New York City Marathon and a trotting horse with an addiction to artichoke.
snippet: Mr. Goldstein was a publicist who promoted Madison Square Garden basketball, the New York City Marathon and a trotting horse with an addiction to artichoke.
